member.name: T:StrawPollNET.API
member.summary: Base API of this Strawpoll library.

member.name: T:StrawPollNET.API.Get
member.summary: Namespace for functions to get details about existing polls.

member.name: M:StrawPollNET.API.Get.GetPoll(System.Int32)
member.summary: [SYNC] This call will fetch the various details including results of an existing Strawpoll.
member.param: The unique id assigned to the poll.
member.returns: FetchedPoll is returned, which houses all poll data.

member.name: M:StrawPollNET.API.Get.GetPollAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: [ASYNC] This call will fetch the various details including results of an existing Strawpoll.
member.param: The unique id assigned to the poll.
member.returns: FetchedPoll is returned, which houses all poll data.

member.name: T:StrawPollNET.API.Create
member.summary: Namespace for functions to create a new Strawpoll.

member.name: M:StrawPollNET.API.Create.CreatePoll(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,StrawPollNET.Enums.DupCheck,System.Boolean)
member.summary: [SYNC] This call will attempt to create a poll and return an object housing all the details about the poll.
member.param: The title that is presented to the voter.
List of strings to be included as options in the poll. Max: 30, Min: 2.
Boolean value dictating whether voters can select multiple choices or not.
Enum reflecting the kind of duplication checking Strawpoll should do.
Boolean value dicating whether or not a captcha should be required.
member.returns: CreatedPoll is returned, which houses all poll data.

member.name: M:StrawPollNET.API.Create.CreatePollAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,StrawPollNET.Enums.DupCheck,System.Boolean)
member.summary: [SYNC] This call will attempt to create a poll and return an object housing all the details about the poll.
member.param: The title that is presented to the voter.
List of strings to be included as options in the poll. Max: 30, Min: 2.
Boolean value dictating whether voters can select multiple choices or not.
Enum reflecting the kind of duplication checking Strawpoll should do.
Boolean value dicating whether or not a captcha should be required.
member.returns: CreatedPoll is returned, which houses all poll data.
